page.title: 08DUN COW LEGEND-STANION
page.content: In the church in STANION there is a strange exhibit.It is a six foot long bone which seems to be a whale bone. Once,a long time ago,the village possessed a communal cow,so huge that she was able to fill any vessel into which she was milked. Seeing how lucky the people of STANION were,the local witch became very jealous and decided to put a stop to their good fortune. One morning before the inhabitants were awake,she appeared in the cow's stall and reminded the cow of her ability to fill any container.Then the witch began to to milk her into a sieve. The poor Dun Cow tried to live up to her reputation by producing hundreds of gallons of milk.The Dun Cow died from exhaustion,and the people of STANION lost their Dun Cow.
